name: Switch (marekrimal)
description:
Movement - A, D

Jump - SPACE

Restart level - R

Next level - BACKSPACE

Game was made in 3 to 4 hours

 ----- 3rd party assets -----

Background music by Erokia https://freesound.org/people/Erokia/sounds/411746/ 

Switch sound by joedeshon https://freesound.org/people/joedeshon/sounds/119415/

Gem pick up sound by gordeszkakerek https://freesound.org/people/gordeszkakerek/sounds/234924/

Icon By Jeremy Loyd https://thenounproject.com/term/light-switch/2235/
